verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to Nob <S%H5011><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%> and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> was afraid <S%H2729><s%> at the meeting <S%H7125><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Why <S%H4069><s%> art thou <S%H859><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> and no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee?

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> The king <S%H4428><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> me a business, <S%H1697><s%> and hath said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Let no <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> any thing <S%H3972><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the business <S%H1697><s%> whereabout <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> thee, and what <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee: and I have appointed <S%H3045><s%> my servants <S%H5288><s%> to <S%H413><s%> such <S%H6423><s%> and such <S%H492><s%> a place. <S%H4725><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore what <S%H4100><s%> is <S%H3426><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> thine hand? <S%H3027><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me five <S%H2568><s%> loaves of bread <S%H3899><s%> in mine hand, <S%H3027><s%> or <S%H176><s%> what there is present. <S%H4672><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> There is no <S%H369><s%> common <S%H2455><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> under <S%H413><s%> <S%H8478><s%> mine hand, <S%H3027><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> there is <S%H3426><s%> hallowed <S%H6944><s%> bread; <S%H3899><s%> if <S%H518><s%> the young men <S%H5288><s%> have kept themselves <S%H8104><s%> at least <S%H389><s%> from women. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H802><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Of <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> a truth women <S%H802><s%> have been kept <S%H6113><s%> from us about these three <S%H8032><s%> days, <S%H8543><s%> since I came out, <S%H3318><s%> and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the young men <S%H5288><s%> are holy, <S%H6944><s%> and the bread is in a manner <S%H1870><s%> common, <S%H2455><s%> yea, <S%H637><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> it were sanctified <S%H6942><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> in the vessel. <S%H3627><s%>

So the priest <S%H3548><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him hallowed <S%H6944><s%> bread: for <S%H3588><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the shewbread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H6440><s%> that was taken <S%H5493><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> hot <S%H2527><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when it was taken away. <S%H3947><s%>

Now a certain man <S%H376><s%> of the servants <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5650><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> was there <S%H8033><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> detained <S%H6113><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> was Doeg, <S%H1673><s%> an Edomite, <S%H130><s%> the chiefest <S%H47><s%> of the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> that <S%H834><s%> belonged to Saul. <S%H7586><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Ahimelech, <S%H288><s%> And is there <S%H3426><s%> not <S%H371><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> spear <S%H2595><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sword? <S%H2719><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> brought <S%H3947><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> nor <S%H1571><s%> my weapons <S%H3627><s%> with <S%H3027><s%> me, because <S%H3588><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> business <S%H1697><s%> required <S%H1961><s%> haste. <S%H5169><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> of Goliath <S%H1555><s%> the Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou slewest <S%H5221><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Elah, <S%H425><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is here wrapped <S%H3874><s%> in a cloth <S%H8071><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> the ephod: <S%H646><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt take <S%H3947><s%> that, take <S%H3947><s%> it: for <S%H3588><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> other <S%H312><s%> save <S%H2108><s%> that here. <S%H2088><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> There is none <S%H369><s%> like that; give <S%H5414><s%> it me.

And David <S%H1732><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and fled <S%H1272><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> for fear of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Achish <S%H397><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gath. <S%H1661><s%>

And the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Achish <S%H397><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Is not <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the land? <S%H776><s%> did they not <S%H3808><s%> sing one to another <S%H6030><s%> of him <S%H2088><s%> in dances, <S%H4246><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> hath slain <S%H5221><s%> his thousands, <S%H505><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> his ten thousands? <S%H7233><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> laid up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> and was sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Achish <S%H397><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gath. <S%H1661><s%>

And he changed <S%H8138><s%> <S%H853><s%> his behavior <S%H2940><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> them, and feigned himself mad <S%H1984><s%> in their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and scrabbled <S%H8427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and let his spittle <S%H7388><s%> fall down <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> his beard. <S%H2206><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Achish <S%H397><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> ye see <S%H7200><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> is mad: <S%H7696><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then have ye brought <S%H935><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> me?

Have I <S%H589><s%> need <S%H2638><s%> of mad men, <S%H7696><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> fellow to play the mad man <S%H7696><s%> in my presence? <S%H5921><s%> shall this <S%H2088><s%> fellow come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> my house? <S%H1004><s%>
